ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SOHO Energetic and Relativistic Nuclei and Electron (ERNE) Key Parameter Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by AK, updated Instrument PI, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by AK 20231113

ResourceHeader.Description: Data include 128s differential fluxes of protons and He4 nuclei, each at six energies between 3 and 96 MeV and of electrons at two energies (4-16 and >16 MeV).  They are key parameter data accessible from CDAWeb. Data are very sparse after January, 1997.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the SOHO ERNE instrument team, and the server from which the data were accessed, in any publication resulting from the use of these data.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Torsti, Jarmo; Valtonen, Eino; Eronen, Timo; Riihonen, Esa

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the SOHO ERNE instrument team, and CDAWeb at GSFC/SPDF, in any publication resulting from the use of these data.

Parameter.Name: Electron fluxes
Parameter.Description:
Electron fluxes at 2 energies (4-16 and >16 MeV) 
at 128s resolution

Parameter.Name: Proton fluxes
Parameter.Description: Proton differential fluxes at 6 energies at 128s resolution

Parameter.Name: Helium fluxes
Parameter.Description: Helium differential fluxes at 6 energies at 128s resolution

Structure.Description: Set of six helium nuclei fluxes
